TopicTitle: Space Planes work VERY well in KSP2

Articles.Content: This is my second approach only, and only had to tweak it about 5 times to get the fuel and engine levels right.
I find that the procedural wings have made doing things in regards to aircraft much more fun than before

Same, I've had a blast making everything from tiny runabouts to tiny SSTOs to a Duna spaceplane to flying wings, and I haven't even gotten into trying to make a larger lifter. 

It's kinda funny that planes work so much better than rockets or interplanetary spaceships, maybe Intercept only went EA because everybody was wasting time flying planes and polishing aerodynamics and they needed a reminder about what the game is supposedly really all about

I've noticed that as well, I wonder if its due to the new methalox stuff being more efficient. I feel like I'm getting way more Dv out of a craft of a given size than I'm used to, and the improved wings just amplify the returns from that. Bodging over my old design paradigms from the first game has left me with spaceplanes with way too much fuel, and launch stacks that carry half the launch assembly unused into orbit with them.
